cab.content: PHIS DOCUMENT' IS TOE PROPERTY OF HER BRITANNIC MAJESTY'^ GOVERNMENTPrinted for the Cabinet. December 1954SECRET Copy No. g 1C. (54) 38410th December, 1954CABINETANGLO -SOUTH AFRICAN relations note by the Prime minister circulate for the information of my colleagues the following exchange ofmessages between the new Prime Minister of South Africa and myself.w. s. c.10 Downing Street, S.W. 1,10th December, 1954.Prime Minister to Mr. StrydomOn the occasion of your appointment as Prime Minister of the Union, mycolleagues and I send you our best wishes. We hope that our collaboration in all matters of common concern will prove no less fruitful than during yourpredecessor^ term of office.Mr. Strydom to Prime MinisterThank you for your good wishes, f, too, look forward to fruitful co-operationwith you and your Government in all matters of common concern in a spirit of mutual goodwill and understanding.
